Jesus Heals a Paralytic
1And getting into a boat he crossed over and came to his own city.
2And behold, some people brought to him a paralytic, lying on a bed. And when Jesus saw their faith, he said to the paralytic, &ldblquot;Take heart, my son; your sins are forgiven.&rdblquot;
3And behold, some of the scribes said to themselves, &ldblquot;This man is blaspheming.&rdblquot;
4But Jesus, knowing Some manuscripts perceiving their thoughts, said, &ldblquot;Why do you think evil in your hearts?
